docs.lead_paragraph: Television's longest-running controversy, children and the medium, is going to be the off-screen spectacular of the summer and fall. The impact of the tube on tot and teen-ager is headed for a new crescendo of studies, petitions, public meetings and private soundings.

headline.main: Battle Over Saturday Mornings Warms Up
